definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: This article introduces the methods of checking integrate circuit module and single crystal transistor.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了用万用表检测集成电路块和单结晶体管的方法。

sentences.english: It also has the function of measuring leads for multimeter.
sentences.chinese: 它也有功能的测量线索，万用表。

sentences.english: A digital multi-meter measures the output voltage of the black box.
sentences.chinese: 数字万用表测量黑盒的输出电压。

sentences.english: Connect the multimeter to the output of the current measuring transformer.
sentences.chinese: 连接万用表到电流测量感应器输出端。

sentences.english: If you open up an analog multimeter you will understand what i mean.
sentences.chinese: 如果你打开一个模拟万用表，你会明白我的意思。

sentences.english: Most multimeters have a fuse to help protect against misuse.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的万用表有一个保险丝来防止损坏。

sentences.english: Touch one of the multimeter probes to the correct pin to be tested.
sentences.chinese: 将万用表的一支表笔接触待测试的正确触针。

sentences.english: Combining with Multimeter, repairer can identify the issue quickly.
sentences.chinese: 结合万用表的使用，维修人员能够快速定位故障所在。

sentences.english: More expensive digital multimeters can equal or better this performance.
sentences.chinese: 很多便宜的数字万用表也可以达到或者比其性能更好。

definition: abbr. for 搭鐵接線|搭铁接线/chassis grounding (i.e. using the chassis as ground, to serve as a return path for current in an electric circuit)
rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)
